Sentencas: Perovskite oxides of composition La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-delta (LSFN-x, 0 <= x <= 0.4) were evaluated as candidate cathode materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Their crystal structures, electrical conductivity, thermal expansion coefficient (TEC), and electrochemical performance were investigated as a function of their Sr content.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: An orthorhombic structure was obtained when 0.3 equivalents of Ni were substituted at the Fe sites, resulting in LaFe0.7Ni0.3O3-delta, and the crystal structure was transformed from orthorhombic to hexagonal upon the substitution of Sr at La sites.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Sr doping was found to increase the TEC of the LSFN material, resulting in a good thermal match with the commonly used Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (GDC) electrolyte.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The LSFN-0.2 also exhibited good chemical compatibility with the GDC electrolyte at temperatures <1000 degrees C. A gradual increase in electrical conductivity with increasing Sr content was observed because of the increase in the concentration of electronic defects.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The cathode electrochemical performance was investigated by AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Among the LSFN series, LSFN-0.2 exhibited the lowest polarization resistance value of 0.065 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The substitution of Sr can promote charge transfer and the adsorption/dissociation of oxygen molecules, thereby decreasing the polarization resistance of the LSFN material.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy measurements were conducted to elucidate the cause of the performance improvement.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The results indicated that the LSFN-0.2 material has potential applications as cathode material for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Improved thermal expansion and electrochemical performance of La1-xSrxFe0.7Ni0.3O3-δ cathodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs
